Most likely everybody knows about the company Opencorporates, which kind of consolidated already many, many of these national databases.

Services for marketing this enterprise CRM business information generally in general for media and just open data areas of this knowledge graph, which in principle would be available to anybody, and this is really the core of the project.

Multilinguality is 1 aspect because we try to cover whole Europe, so information appears in many languages.

I'm sure that the models data brokerage OK and data linking and so on, so it's a whole set of especially this data linking is is very important if we want to consolidate and interlink all these datasets.

Yeah, you see that this is kind of data value chain going from left to right.
